entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
